statements: SELECT * FROM clinical_trials_data WHERE status = 'completed'
SELECT trial_name, sponsor, start_date FROM clinical_trials_data WHERE enrollment_count > 1000
SELECT trial_id, trial_name FROM clinical_trials_data ORDER BY trial_name DESC
SELECT * FROM clinical_trials_data WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31'
SELECT sponsor, COUNT(trial_id) AS trial_count FROM clinical_trials_data GROUP BY sponsor
SELECT trial_id, trial_name, sponsor, start_date, end_date, status, enrollment_count FROM clinical_trials_data;
SELECT * FROM clinical_trials_data WHERE status='completed';
SELECT trial_id, trial_name, start_date, end_date FROM clinical_trials_data WHERE sponsor='ABC Pharma' ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT trial_id, trial_name, status FROM clinical_trials_data WHERE enrollment_count > 1000 ORDER BY trial_name DESC;
SELECT trial_id, trial_name, sponsor, status FROM clinical_trials_data WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01' AND sponsor LIKE '%Research%' ORDER BY trial_id;
SELECT * FROM clinical_trials;
SELECT trial_id, trial_name, start_date, end_date, status FROM clinical_trials WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT trial_name, start_date, end_date FROM clinical_trials ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT trial_name, status FROM clinical_trials WHERE trial_id = 3;
SELECT trial_name, data_type, data_value FROM trial_data WHERE data_type = 'result' ORDER BY data_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM clinical_trials WHERE status='ongoing';
SELECT trial_name, start_date FROM clinical_trials WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT trial_id, trial_name FROM clinical_trials ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM trial_data WHERE data_type='result' AND data_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT trial_name, data_value FROM clinical_trials JOIN trial_data ON clinical_trials.trial_id = trial_data.trial_id WHERE trial_name LIKE '%cancer%' AND data_type='outcome';
SELECT * FROM clinical_trials;
SELECT trial_name, start_date, status FROM clinical_trials WHERE status = 'Ongoing';
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM trial_patients WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT trial_name, location, status FROM clinical_trials ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT trial_name, end_date, location FROM clinical_trials WHERE status = 'Completed';
SELECT * FROM clinical_trials ORDER BY start_date DESC, trial_name ASC;
SELECT trial_name, location FROM clinical_trials WHERE status = 'Completed';
SELECT patient_name, age, gender, trial_name FROM trial_patients JOIN clinical_trials ON trial_patients.trial_id = clinical_trials.trial_id WHERE age > 50;
SELECT trial_name, result FROM clinical_trials JOIN trial_results ON clinical_trials.trial_id = trial_results.trial_id WHERE result LIKE '%positive%';
SELECT trial_name, COUNT(patient_id) AS num_patients FROM trial_patients JOIN clinical_trials ON trial_patients.trial_id = clinical_trials.trial_id GROUP BY trial_name HAVING num_patients > 10;
SELECT * FROM clinical_trials;
SELECT trial_name, start_date, enrollment_count FROM clinical_trials;
SELECT patient_id, full_name, age, health_condition FROM patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT site_name, location, trial_name FROM trial_sites JOIN clinical_trials ON trial_sites.trial_id = clinical_trials.trial_id;
SELECT treatment_name, cost FROM treatments WHERE duration_in_days > 30 ORDER BY cost DESC;
SELECT * FROM clinical_trials WHERE enrollment_count > 100 ORDER BY trial_name ASC;
SELECT trial_name, enrollment_count FROM clinical_trials WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';

SELECT patients.full_name, patients.health_condition, trial_sites.site_name FROM patients JOIN trial_sites ON patients.site_id = trial_sites.site_id WHERE patients.age > 30 ORDER BY patients.full_name DESC;

SELECT trial_name, start_date, end_date, COUNT(patients.patient_id) AS total_patients FROM clinical_trials LEFT JOIN trial_sites ON clinical_trials.trial_id = trial_sites.trial_id LEFT JOIN patients ON trial_sites.site_id = patients.site_id GROUP BY trial_name, start_date, end_date HAVING total_patients > 50 ORDER BY total_patients DESC;
SELECT treatment_name, AVG(cost) AS average_cost FROM treatments GROUP BY treatment_name HAVING AVG(cost) > 500 ORDER BY average_cost DESC;
SELECT * FROM ClinicalTrials ORDER BY start_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT trial_name, start_date FROM ClinicalTrials WHERE status='Active';
SELECT participant_name, gender FROM Participants WHERE age > 30;
SELECT treatment_name, dosage FROM Treatments WHERE duration > 10 ORDER BY treatment_name;
SELECT doctor_name, speciality, hospital_name FROM Doctors WHERE speciality='Cardiology';
SELECT * FROM ClinicalTrials WHERE status = 'In Progress';
SELECT participant_name, age, gender FROM Participants ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT trial_name, start_date, end_date FROM ClinicalTrials WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY end_date ASC;
SELECT treatment_name, duration FROM Treatments WHERE dosage = '10mg' AND duration > 7;
SELECT doctor_name, speciality, hospital_name FROM Doctors WHERE speciality LIKE '%Surgery%' ORDER BY doctor_name;
